articles.title: Elon Musk Launches New Political Party Over Independence Day Weekend
articles.description: Elon Musk officially launched a new third political party over Independence Day weekend, escalating a dramatic and tumultuous public split with President Donald Trump.

articles.title: Israel Launches Airstrikes Targeting Yemen’s Houthi Rebels
articles.description: Israel’s military launched airstrikes early Monday targeting ports and facilities held by Yemen’s Houthi rebels, with the rebels responding with missile fire targeting Israel.

articles.title: UNAids Chief ‘Shaken and Disgusted’ by US Cuts That Will Mean Millions More Deaths
articles.description: The head of the global agency tackling Aids says she expects HIV rates to soar and deaths to multiply in the next four years as a direct impact of the 'seismic' US cuts to aid spending.
